meanings: reappearance, a second appearance, reemergence, revival, readvent, reproduction, (재생하다) 재현하다 reproduce, repeat

phrases.phrase: 저것은 원래의 건물을 정확히 재현한 것입니다.
meanings: 관광지에서의 표현 That's an exact reproduction of the original building.
관광지에서의 표현 That's an accurate replica of the original building.

examples.korean: The museum attempts to recreate the sights and sounds of wartime Britain. 발음듣기 그 박물관은 전시 영국의 광경과 소리들을 그대로 재현하려고 시도하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The museum attempts to recreate the sights and sounds of wartime Britain. 발음

examples.korean: The movie makes no pretension to reproduce life. 발음듣기 그 영화는 삶의 재현을 자처하지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The movie makes no pretension to reproduce life. 발음

examples.korean: This election will not be a replay of the last one. 발음듣기 이번 선거가 지난번 선거의 재현이 되지는 않을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This election will not be a replay of the last one. 발음

examples.korean: The procession included a tableau of the Battle of Hastings. 발음듣기 그 행렬에는 헤이스팅스 전투를 재현한 장면이 들어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The procession included a tableau of the Battle of Hastings. 발음

examples.korean: The doorway is a 19th century reconstruction of Norman work. 발음듣기 그 출입구는 노르만 작품을 19세기에 재현한 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The doorway is a 19th century reconstruction of Norman work. 발음
